overview_of_class: Examination of the role of sexuality in the cultural, economic, political, and social organization of the United States. Sex work, sex tourism, sexual migration, LGBT social movements, and moral panics. Taught with GNDR ST 232, may not receive credit for both courses.
name: Sexuality and Society
title: WCAS SOCIOL 232-0-20 Sexuality and Society
